alfredsnippet.snippet:
# IF THE IMAGES DON'T EXIST LOCALLY, FETCH THEM FROM THE PRODUCTION ENV
RewriteCond %{REQUEST_FILENAME} !-f
RewriteCond %{HTTP_HOST} (^.*\.dev|.*\.xip\.io:[0-9]{4}|localhost) [NC]
RewriteRule [^.]+\.(jpe?g|gif|png|svg) http://www.provamel.com/$0 [NC,L]
alfredsnippet.name: .htaccess - Load images from production
